properties.description: Three-bedroom semi-detached family home just 0.5 miles from Petts Wood station. Features two receptions, a spacious kitchen/breakfast room, conservatory, utility room, and cloakroom. Upstairs: three bedrooms, family bathroom, and separate WC. Benefits include double glazing, gas central heating, and a well-presented interior, close to shops, schools, and woodland...
properties.location: Petts Wood Road, Petts Wood, Orpington BR5

properties.description: Immaculate two-bedroom, two-bathroom flat with a private courtyard garden. The modern open-plan kitchen/living area features solid wood floors, integrated appliances, and bi-fold doors to the garden. Both bedrooms are doubles, with a family bathroom and separate wet room. Additional highlights include walnut doors, Sky TV/aerial wiring, and a 10-year building guarantee...

A beautifully presented four-bedroom family home in the highly sought-after Britannia Village, Royal Docks, with a private rear garden. The property features a spacious open-plan reception and kitchen, perfect for modern family living, and a loft conversion with a pseudo balcony. Additional highlights include contemporary fittings throughout, generous living space, and excellent transport links nearby, making this an ideal home for families or professionals seeking style and convenience...

A charming one-bedroom split-level flat located in a quiet residential area of Wallington. This property boasts a bright living space with large windows, a modern kitchen with built-in appliances, and a cozy bedroom with ample storage. The bathroom has contemporary fixtures and the flat benefits from excellent local transport links and nearby amenities, making it ideal for first-time buyers or investors...

A stunning six-bedroom detached home set in a prestigious area near Blackheath Village. Features include a grand entrance hall, multiple reception rooms, a modern kitchen/dining space, and a landscaped garden. Upstairs are spacious bedrooms with en-suite bathrooms, perfect for a large family. Additional highlights include a home office, garage, and proximity to excellent schools, parks, and local amenities...

This first-floor duplex apartment offers modern living in the heart of Colchester, within walking distance of the city centre, Castle Park, and the train station. It features an open-plan lounge and kitchen, a bright bedroom upstairs, and contemporary bathroom fittings. Perfect for young professionals or investors, the flat benefits from gas central heating, double glazing, and secure entry access...
properties.location: East Street, Colchester, Essex CO1, UK

properties.description: A beautifully maintained Victorian terraced home combining period charm with modern comforts. The house includes a spacious living room, updated kitchen, two well-proportioned bedrooms, and a contemporary bathroom. Additional features include a private garden, high ceilings, original fireplaces, and excellent transport links nearby. Ideal for couples or small families looking for a blend of character and convenience...
properties.location: St. Winefride's Avenue, Manor Park, London E12
